Definition: Integer. The mathematical name for any positive or negative whole number.
Notes: This is a common primitive data type

Definition: A float is a number that has a fractional or decimal part.
Notes: This is a common primitive data type

Definition: A boolean is simply true or false, and can be nothing other than true or false
Notes: This is a common primitive data type

Definition: A string is used to store characters, which could be text or numbers.
Notes: This is a common primitive data type

Definition: This type points to (or references) a location in memory
Notes: This is a common primitive data type in compiled languages.

Definition: Character. This data type stores one single character.
Notes: This is a common primitive data type in compiled languages.
